name: An tale of Lixoso
description:
An tale of Lixoso is an game speedr-, developed on RPG Maker MV that you are Lixoso, an very cool guy, but there is very scaryyyy stuff happening on the city, when you arrive to your friend you see that aleadry it is very strange because there was a earthquake.

The sprites, musics, codes and backgrounds of this game is not mine, i am just making a game to be very funny.
